prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: outputs supported by DITA Open Toolkit Eclipse help
targets supported by DITA Open Toolkit Eclipse help

section.p: Eclipse Help is one of the DITA Open Toolkit target outputs. When this output type is specified, the Toolkit produces a directory containing a set of files that can be installed as an Eclipse documentation plug-in. This allows the output to be displayed as Eclipse help or in an Eclipse Infocenter.
